snippet: The company said the drug reduced levels of plaque in the brain and significantly improved cognition in a small early-stage study.
abstract: Biotechnology company Biogen Idec is planning a late-stage trial of its experimental treatment for Alzheimer's disease after drug significantly improved cognition in a small early-stage study.
lead_paragraph: The company said the drug reduced levels of plaque in the brain and significantly improved cognition in a small early-stage study.

headline.main: Biogen Idec Alzheimer’s Drug to Receive Late-Stage Study
headline.print_headline: Biogen Idec Alzheimer’s Drug to Receive Late-Stage Study
